bug.short_desc: Provide util methods to find first item by name

long_desc.thetext:
In general a developer needs a method to get an first item form a tree structure models by passing a name as identifier.
For example: my.util.findFirstChild(name, parent, childProperty, labelPath)
- name {String} the name from the child node. - parent {Node} the parent note to start search - childProperty is the identifier to find the childrens - labelPath is the identifier to compare it with the path
The childProperty is needed to for the chain and the labelPath is the property where this identifier could be found.
The algorithm should be implemented as breadth-first search. This means check all children with the distance one. When no item could be found, check all children with the distance two and so on.
